greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = (p^2)-1.
comment: Absolute values of A046970, the Dirichlet inverse of the Jordan function J_2 (A007434).
Absolute values of the Möbius transform of A055491. (See _Benoit Cloitre_'s May 31 2002 comment in A046970).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := If[n==1, 1, Times @@ ((#^2-1)& @@@ FactorInteger[n])]; Array[a, 50]  (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 05 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 04 2018
